name: HKQuantitySeriesSampleQuery
desc: A query that accesses the series data associated with a quantity sample.

items.name: init(quantityType: HKQuantityType, predicate: NSPredicate?, quantityHandler: (HKQuantitySeriesSampleQuery, HKQuantity?, DateInterval?, HKQuantitySample?, Bool, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a new query for a series of the specified quantity type.

items.name: var includeSample: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the query should return the series sample.

items.name: var orderByQuantitySampleStartDate: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the query groups the results based on the quantity sampleâ€™s start date.
